imdb.plot outline: Daria, Helen, Dorma, Ronney and Lisa arrived from different royal families to study at the magic school Wondermont under the leadership of the Great Immortal. Adventures, mysteries, riddles, dangers waiting for our heroines on the way to comprehension of wisdom and magic.
imdb.title: Little Tiaras
plot: Daria, Helen, Dorma, Ronney and Lisa arrived from different royal families to study at the magic school Wondermont under the leadership of the Great Immortal. Adventures, mysteries, riddles, dangers waiting for our heroines on the way to comprehension of wisdom and magic.

Five Princesses from different Kingdoms come to a school of wizardry under the leadership of the Great Immortal. Daria, Helen, Dorma, Rooney and Lisa each have their own magic powers, but they are also ordinary kids in school, discovering real magic inside themselves. Adventures, mysteries, and dangers await the Princesses on the way to wisdom and magic.::Lucy Tsoy
